segments.text: Have any plans for the weekend , Tom ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , I ’ m going for a hike in the southern Rocky Mountains .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , do you go hiking often ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I go as much as I can . I love hiking because you can really get in touch with nature .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It would be nice to get out of the city . Do you want some company ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . But , it will be a long hike , 30 miles in three days . Have you been hiking before ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , I go a lot too . I saw a bear and a mountain lion on my last hike .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Wow ! You must have been pretty far away from the city .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , my friend and I hiked in a very wild part of the national forest .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , bring him along too . We ’ ll have a great time this weekend .
segments.speaker: S2
